name: role
description: Obtain information about all/specific roles, or manage the roles of a member

options.name: role
options.description: List all the details of the specified role

options.name: grant
options.description: Give a role to the member

options.name: member
options.description: The member whom you want to add the role to

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to give to the member

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why you granted this role (defaults to "Granted by [Your Tag]")

options.name: revoke
options.description: Remove a role from the member

options.name: member
options.description: The member whom you want to remove the role from

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to remove from the member

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why you removed this role (defaults to "Removed by [Your Tag]")
